mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (idx, order_number, user_id, order_person_name, order_person_phone, receiver_name, receiver_postcode, receiver_address, receiver_phone, memo, total_price, used_point, result_total_price, payment, date, item_idx1, item_img1, item_name1, item_count1, item_sellingPrice1, item_total_price1, item_idx2, item_img2, item_name2, item_count2, item_sellingPrice2, item_total_price2, item_idx3, item_img3, item_name3, item_count3, item_sellingPrice3, item_total_price3, item_idx4, item_img4, item_name4, item_count4, item_sellingPrice4, item_total_price4, item_idx5, item_img5, item_name5, item_count5, item_sellingPrice5, item_total_price5) VALUES (0, #{order_number}, #{user_id}, #{order_person_name}, #{order_person_phone}, #{receiver_name}, #{receiver_postcode}, #{receiver_address}, #{receiver_phone}, #{memo}, #{total_price}, #{used_point}, #{result_total_price}, #{payment}, default, #{item_index1}, #{item_img1}, #{item_name1}, #{item_count1}, #{item_sellingPrice1}, #{item_total_price1}, "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null", "null")

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payment WHERE user_id = #{param1} ORDER BY idx desc LIMIT 0,1
